items.sentence: I asked Tom if he could recommend a good lawyer.

I don\'t think that Tom has ever skinned a wolf.
I ended up doing something I didn\'t want to do.
I got the impression Tom wasn\'t having any fun.
Tom complained that the soup was not hot enough.
Tom could have phrased his answer more politely.
I couldn\'t live with myself if I ever hurt you.
Tom and Mary aren\'t going to be happy about it.
Tom and Mary aren\'t going to do that this week.
You should eat more spinach. It\'s good for you.

If anyone here can help us, we\'d appreciate it.
